summary: An email from an FBI forensic accountant in the New York Field Office transmitting a draft analysis of Ghislaine Maxwell's credit cards from financial productions received in the investigation. The email indicates the analysis is for discussion purposes only and subject to change.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email transmits a draft analysis of her credit cards from financial productions received by the FBI.

persons.name: Forensic Accountant
persons.context: Author of the email who prepared and transmitted the draft analysis of Maxwell's credit cards from the FBI New York Field Office.

connections.description: The forensic accountant is analyzing Maxwell's financial records (credit cards) as part of an FBI investigation.

events.title: Transmission of Maxwell Credit Card Analysis
events.description: An FBI forensic accountant emails a draft analysis of Ghislaine Maxwell's credit cards to recipients, noting it is for discussion and subject to change.

locations.name: FBI New York Field Office
locations.context: Location of the forensic accountant who sent the email and is analyzing the financial records.

keyFacts: The FBI was conducting a forensic financial analysis of Ghislaine Maxwell's credit cards as of June 2020.
The analysis was based on financial productions received by the FBI, indicating subpoenas or seizures of financial records.
The document shows active FBI investigation into Maxwell's finances around the time of her arrest (July 2020).
The analysis was characterized as a draft for discussion purposes only and subject to change.
The communication originated from the FBI New York Field Office, which was involved in the Maxwell investigation.
